nodes.bodyText: what would happen if there is 2 multiselect in one form? given multiSelectListAccessoryHashMap is static

@Andati - an adapterKey is used to get ItemList as well as the ListOfSelected items, so it will use the key of the defined multiselect for each. I have tested this with two MultiSelect in a single form and seems to be working. I am also open if you have any suggestion.
